title: London, BL, Add. 17221
Digital Catalogue of Syriac Manuscripts in the British Library
Psalms proper for the several daily services, according to the Peshitta version, following the use of the Egyptian monks in the desert of Scete.
Morning Prayer.
Prayer of S. John the Baptist.
Prayer of Severus of Antioch.

Pss. xx., xxiii., xxiv., xxv., xxvi., xxix., xxx., xxxiv., xli., xliii., xlvi., and xlvii.
Prayer of Philoxenus.
Sext.
Prayer of Abraham Kīdūnāyā.
Pss. liv., lvii., lxi., lxv., Iv., xlviii., lxxxiv., lxxxv., lxxxvi., lxxxvii., xci., and xciii.
prayer.
